name: personalty
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the things you own that you can take with you, such as money, vehicles, or furniture: All property is classified as either realty or personalty. She left a personalty in excess of half a million pounds.
More examplesFewer examplesThe personalty of a few major landowners accounts for most of the area's wealth.Although he comes from the aristocracy, he has only a rather modest personalty.Her estate was valued at over a million pounds in personalty.
